description:
A girl involved in the Martian independence movement. She is headed for Earth in order to negotiate privately with the government of Arbrau, and CGS has been commissioned to escort her there. It was Kudelia who successfully convened
the "Noachis July Assembly," a gathering of independence movements, which attracted attention from all quarters.
2nd season:After the Arbrau prime minister election, she completed the negotiations over halfmetal rights and returned to Mars. Establishing the Admoss Company to handle the primary processing and distribution of halfmetal, she now serves as its representative. She is still active in advocating for Mars`s economic independence, sponsoring work for the unemployed, and so forth.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Kudelia Aina Bernstein
